3M Diamond Grade Rail Car Markings, 983-10 FRA, kiss-cut (4 in x 18 in), white, 4 in x 50 yd

  • 3M™ Diamond Grade™ Rail Car Markings 983 are microprismatic retroreflective conspicuity markings designed to mark the rail cars for enhanced visibility and detection on the rails

  • These markings are available in a variety of colours and configurations designed to meet industry standards
  • Conspicuity markings with a custom logo are available for regulated vehicles.

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Conspicuity markings for rail cars to offer enhanced visibility and detection
  • Microprismatic lens retroreflectors formed in transparent resin
  • Reflective both in daytime and at nighttime for enhanced visibility
  • High/wide entrance angularity
  • Non-metallic construction
  • Pressure-sensitive adhesive backing
  • Colour: White
  • Pre-sealed edges
  • Meets Railway Equipment Reflectorization Rules
  • For use on rail cars and locomotives

entry.title: 3M SST-2 - 3M Smoke and Sound Barrier Tape, 2 in x 75 ft (5 cm x 22.8 m) SST-2 7100138393
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 35.81

[shortdesc]

3M Smoke and Sound Barrier Tape, 2 in x 75 ft (5 cm x 22.8 m)

  • 3M™ Smoke and Sound Tape is an elastomeric tape that can act as a barrier to smoke and airborne sound transmission in non-fire-rated wall and floor assemblies, by minimizing transfer between rooms and floors when installed in a variety of construction joints and some through penetrations
  • This tape creates an effective barrier to mitigate smoke and toxic gas spread, with an L-rating of less than 1 CFM/linear foot at ambient and 204°C (400°F)
  • It has been tested to ASTM E 90 and ASTM E 413 – achieving an STC-Rating of 54 when tested in an STC 54-rated wall assembly.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Poland

    Product Information

  • Acts as barrier to smoke and airborne sound in non-fire-rated wall and floor assemblies
  • Minimizes smoke and sound transfer between rooms and floors
  • High tack adhesive bonds to most common building materials
  • Adheres to damp surfaces
  • Can be installed in a broad range of temperatures as low as -18°C (0°F) and as high as 49°C (120°F)
  • 3M™ Smoke and Sound Tape is tested to the criteria of ASTM E84/UL 723 and CAN/ULC-S102 Standard Test Method for Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials
    		•

entry.title: 3M FB-SPRAY-SIL-WHT - 3M Fire Barrier Watertight Spray, white, 5 gallon (18.9 L) pail FB-SPRAY-SIL-WHT 7100138396
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 604.49

[shortdesc]

3M Fire Barrier Watertight Spray, white, 5 gallon (18.9 L) pail

  • 3M™ Fire Barrier Watertight Spray is a sprayable, moisture-curing hybrid siliconized polymer that forms a tough, elastomeric coating
  • This material is used to firestop perimeter joints, like curtain wall joints, and other construction joints that need to prevent fire and water from moving floor to floor.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Seals interior construction voids
  • Superior washout resistance
  • Meets UL Water Leakage Test, W-Rating— Class One requirements for systems tested and listed in accordance with ANSI/UL 1479, and and CAN/ULC-S115
  • Up to 3-hour fire protection in construction joints per ASTM E 1966 (UL 2079)
  • Helps minimize noise transfer (STC Rated)
  • CPVC compatible
    		•

    Origin Country Poland

    Product Information

  • Provides up to 4-hour fire protection in construction joints per ASTM E1966 (UL 2079) and CAN/ULC-S115
  • up to 3-hour fire protection in perimeter joints per ASTM E2307 and CAN/ULC-S115 at the maximum extended joint width.
  • Can be installed in temperatures as low as -18°C (0°F) and as high as 49°C (120°F)
  • Broad temperature range when applying
  • Meets UL Water Leakage Test, W-Rating— Class One requirements for systems tested and listed in accordance with ANSI/UL 1479, and and CAN/ULC-S115
  • Acts as an immediate barrier to water leakage
  • Up to 2-hour fire protection in through-penetration applications per ASTM E814 (UL 1479) and CAN/ULC-S115
    		•

entry.title: 3M SST-4 - 3M Smoke and Sound Barrier Tape, 4 in x 75 ft (10 cm x 22.8 m) SST-4 7100139305
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 71.61

[shortdesc]

3M Smoke and Sound Barrier Tape, 4 in x 75 ft (10 cm x 22.8 m)

  • 3M™ Smoke and Sound Tape is an elastomeric tape that can act as a barrier to smoke and airborne sound transmission in non-fire-rated wall and floor assemblies, by minimizing transfer between rooms and floors when installed in a variety of construction joints and some through penetrations
  • This tape creates an effective barrier to mitigate smoke and toxic gas spread, with an L-rating of less than 1 CFM/linear foot at ambient and 204°C (400°F)
  • It has been tested to ASTM E 90 and ASTM E 413 – achieving an STC-Rating of 54 when tested in an STC 54-rated wall assembly.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Poland

    Product Information

  • Acts as barrier to smoke and airborne sound in non-fire-rated wall and floor assemblies
  • Minimizes smoke and sound transfer between rooms and floors
  • High tack adhesive bonds to most common building materials
  • Adheres to damp surfaces
  • Can be installed in a broad range of temperatures as low as -18°C (0°F) and as high as 49°C (120°F)
  • 3M™ Smoke and Sound Tape is tested to the criteria of ASTM E84/UL 723 and CAN/ULC-S102 Standard Test Method for Surface Burning Characteristics of Building Materials
    		•
